sentences.sentence: The orbit of this comet intersects the orbit of the Earth.
sentences.translation: 这颗彗星的轨道和地球的轨道相交。

sentences.sentence: We were not altogether sure that the comet would miss the Earth.
sentences.translation: 我们不太确定这颗彗星是否会错过地球。

sentences.sentence: The comet is going to come back in 2061 and we are all going to be able to see it. Well, our offspring are, anyway.
sentences.translation: 这颗彗星将于2061年返回，到时我们都可以看到它。哦，无论如何，我们子孙是可以看到的。
